abstract: No one was seriously injured in the mishap.
snippet: No one was seriously injured in the mishap.
lead_paragraph: A commercial boat -- a tugboat or barge -- capsized in the Hudson River on Thursday afternoon, the Fire Department said. Three people were rescued from the water, none of them seriously injured, and no one is missing, the Fire Department said. The boat went down off West 50th Street around 4:30 p.m. and began drifting downriver, a department spokesman said.
